invitationMessage:
Are you ready to test your limits on Manchmark?
Download now and see where do you stand among players! 
http://manchmark.yusuf.app/
getNumbersInfo:
To add friends from your contacts, you must verify your phone number and grant access to your contacts.

Your contacts will not be shared or stored in any way.
errMustBetween3and20: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters
errOnlyEngLetters: Username can only contain english letters and numbers.
errUsernameAlreadyInUse: This username is already in use
yourScoreIsHigherThanXOfPlayers: Your score is higher than 2% of players
repetitionIsKeyToSuccess: Repetition is the key to success!
answerMuchInXSeconds: Answer as much as possible in 2 seconds
dontRush: Don't rush! Making mistakes will cost you points.
youCanGroupNumbers: You can group numbers to make it easier to memorize!
pressTheScreenColorChanges: Press the screen as soon as the color changes
pressForNextPhase: Press the screen for the next phase!
pressTheScreenFast: Press the screen as fast as you can
youCanUseMoreFingers: You can use more than one finger!
writeMuchInXSeconds: Write as much word as possible in 2 seconds
youCanWriteInAnyOrder: You can write any one of the 3 words in any order!
dontForgetToMarkTheWords: Don't forget to mark the words you have already seen!
XmistakesAllowed: You are allowed to make 2 mistakes each round!
leaderboardTutorial: You can press the globe icon for global leaderboard.
